messages.messageBody:
Try a search under baby cart as well.

There is (or was) a top quality site with details of all the films, and
various other useful bits of information on the tv series, and later movies.

Unfortunately I had it book marked on another PC but will have a search
myself again.

Kind regards

Rob

Message: 1
Date: Wed, 6 Feb 2002 14:29:02 +0000 (GMT)
From: The Mad Samurai <samurai_v_ninja@...>
Subject: (unknown)


Im doing another college project on samurai films, and am trying to research
and write about the life of the film director Kenji Misumi who directed the
Lone Wolf And Cub films and the Zatoichi series, with no luck on finding any
information except a list of the films that he directed. Can you direct me
to any sites with a more detailed bigraphy about him?

arigato!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Kirana
